metadata.title: Five Finger Death Punch - A Little Bit Off
metadata.creator: Five Finger Death Punch

tracks.text: White text on a black background. Five Finger Death Punch. A Little Bit Off.
A man with waist length dreadlocks, guitarist Zoltan Bathory, sits by a pool. He checks his phone.
Management: Hey! You guys REALLY need to shoot the video. We're running out of time!!
Bathory shakes his head and types, Uhhhmmm. Shrug emoji. Virus emoji. Death emoji. Like how?
Management replies, Is there ANY way?? Bathory shakes his head.
He replies, I mean. We can try. Shrug emoji.
He drops the phone in his lap and leans back.
Text. So we contacted a film crew to try and shoot this video...
6 people stand in a white room, carrying various bags and equipment
Text. But given the circumstances... of course everybody was concerned...
The 6 people wear various masks
Text. ...And then we found out, some of our film crew were stuck in quarantine.
3 of the people get red X's
Text. They'd also need to keep the required social distance...
The 3 people are spread out, with "6 foot minimum" label between them
Text. This is going to be a cluster fxck. Because of this a-hole
A diagram of a virus
The text F8 glows in a red dot. We pull out to reveal an alarm clock displaying 7:57
A man in a bed hits the alarm clock.
Text. Here is the storyboard for what we wanted to do next...
Above the clouds, concept art shows bassist a man in a white robe with a halo and a long beard playing chess against a Bathory wearing black armor with a black scythe and large black wings
Text. But the makeup artist and props department got quarantined as well... So...
Bassist Chris Kael, a bald man with a long beard, sits at a chess table opposite Bathory. They both wear casual clothes. A white sheet is hung up behind them.
Kael moves a pawn. Singer Ivan Moody sits up in his bed. Moody gets up at 9:42.
Moody, wearing a white hat, walks down the abandoned street of the Vegas strip, looking up.
He stands in the middle of the street in daylight, looking around.
Text. The rest of the band couldn't travel so..
Storyboard of a demon with horns carrying a trident and a man in a cloak with a scepter. X's appear above both characters.
Moody walks in front of the Bellagio. At the chess board, Bathory picks up a black pawn, and dramatically places it in front of Kael's pawn.
In Vegas, Moody looks up and around
Moody walks down the wide, empty sidewalk. A small black dog walks beside him.
Kael moves a bishop
Moody stands under a walkway. An arrow points to the street in front of him, labelled Visual Effects Grim Reaper.
Moody walks in front of a dark Welcome Center, looking around at the empty side walk.
Moody walks down stairs and in front of a DSW.
He and the dog wander through the empty road in front of an ornate building
He looks up at the dark New York New York building
He looks over a railing at the empty Vegas Strip
Text. We were going to have a huge crowd of people...
He walks under a red structure labeled The Park.
He walks by an eiffel tower.
Bathory looks down. Kael picks up his queen.
Moody looks up at a statue of liberty. New chairon appears for FNN, saying I told a little white lie today.
Kael looks up from the chess board. A visual effects placeholder halo floats over his head
Bathory knocks over a pawn
Moody walks past an empty casino, looking around. Bathory strums his fingers. A ring depicts a skull, and another depicts an outstretched wing. He picks up a knight.
Text. A cool scene was supposed to be here...
Moody stops suddenly, then looks up at empty air
Storyboard shows a law officer on a rearing horse, looking down at Moody. Close up on the horse head of the black Knight piece.
Moody shrugs and puts his hat back on.
Moody looks down at the empty strip from a pedestrian walkway, looking at an eiffel tower and large orange sphere
Kael takes his white bishop and knocks over the black Knight.
Bathory moves a piece. Visual effects Angel Of Death annotation, picture of black wings, arrow pointing over Bathory's shoulder.
Moody looks up at the Las Vegas Blvd sign in front of a large building with white columns
Kael picks up his queen. Moody looks up at a liquor store.
Shot missing VFX DEVIL TEMPTING IVAN.
Character design for a devil. In front of the liquor store, Moody shakes his head and walks away
Bathory raises his hands, then knocks his king down in front of Kael's Queen.
Moody, falls into bed.
The black king rolls dramatically on the chessboard
Moody looks up at us from bed, singing
Kael and Bathory fistbump over the chessboard
Moody points up as he mouths the final lyric. He turns to us and points, then hits the lights.
The alarm clock glitches between 8:00 and F:8
Fade to black.
